summary: The mother of the two icons, Doge and ​Neiro - Sato is a project that honors Atsuko ​Sato herself, the compassionate heart ​behind the iconic Dogecoin and Neiro. Atsuko’s life is ​a testament to the power of love and ​kindness, and SATO is a way for the ​world to give back, ensuring her legacy ​of compassion endures.
